item.title: Sports Data Analytics and Visualization
item.description: This is my post on Sports Data Analytics and Visualization. This is a page where I will post my findings for my data that I use for my final project. I really enjoy this class and how I am able to apply my ability to use a new coding language that Iâ€™ve learned to learn more about the sports that I love to watch as a fan.
